= Introduction =

MediaFormatBridge is the object representing media format(codec).


== `:new(...)` ==
_ctor_
creates MediaFormatBridge object

|| *named parameter* || *description* ||
|| mf|| other MediaFormatBridge ||
|| id || id of well known supprted codec  (PCMU,PCMA,SPEEX)||
|| name|| name of the codec||
|| rate|| sampling rate of the codec||
|| type || type of media format (MediaType_SPEECH,MediaType_DTMF) ||

{{{
--
-- Invalid MediaFormatBridge
--
m1 = MediaFormatBridge:new();
l:loginfo("m1 = "..m1:name())

--
-- initiates by well known name
--
m2 = MediaFormatBridge:new{id="SPEEX"};
l:loginfo("m1 = "..m2:name())

--
-- initiates by supplying all parameters
--
m3 = MediaFormatBridge:new{name="PCMU", rate=8000, type=iw.MediaType_SPEECH};
l:loginfo("m3 = "..m3:name()..",rate="..m3:rate())


--
-- initiates by supplying other MediaFormatBridge object
--
m4 = MediaFormatBridge:new{mf=m1}
l:loginfo("m3 = "..m3:name())


}}}

== `:name()` ==
_property_

codec name

== `:sdpmapping()` ==
_property_

sdp mapping (0 for PCMU for example)

== `:rate()` ==
_property_

codec sampling rate (8000 for PCMU for example)
